integrated_platform: The integrated platform for managing your shared property
holiday_management: Holiday home management solutions to support hosts and boost their growth.
enhance_booking: Enhance bookings and increase income, start now by synchronizing your properties across multiple platforms to increase occupancy rates while avoiding booking conflicts.
smart_lock_desc: Eliminate 99% of the hassle of exporting smart lock codes. With the smart entry feature, an access code is automatically exported for each reservation, with the ability to track and disable it with a single click from one place.
accurate_analytics: Accurate analytics in a simplified way, this analysis keeps you informed about your financial details to make a data-driven decision.
